body:
Hello everyone, I decided to set up a game in which I collect staff's secrets and see if the community can guess who's is who! I will give a list of names and a list of secrets in random order, good luck!

P.S. I`m thinking of maybe doing one for regular players and if I do, I will make a completely different thread about it! Good luck!!!

P.P.S This is only certain staff, the ones who gave me a secret.

Staff Members; 
- TNTPotato
- Random_Pet
- FrozenSolstice
- SethSky
- PieZ
- Arigenn
- MidnightStorm
- Awesomerp
- Tazz
- Resepignev
- Smiley
- Iron

Secrets;
- I am home schooled
- I love star wars, my favorite scenes were the Hoth battle and the Death Star.
- I am a mermaid.
- I once had cancer.
- I almost get expelled twice because of my behavior at school.
- I purposely threw a tournament once to teach my leader a lesson.
- I am golden elite on CS:GO
- I have a nebula strategy called strolling, where I just run to the monument without fighting until I break it.
- My first friend on Avicus was TheRomanTrident.
- I was born with 2 thumbs on the same hand.
- If Avicus was a boy I would __ him.
- I have attempted to become a staff member on over 20 Minecraft servers.

Good Luck!

|Acceqted|


I will ill post the answers in a week!

replies.body:
Well here they are, thank you everyone for participating. Tell me how many You got right!

- TNTPotato: I have attempted to become staff on over 30 Minecraft servers.
- Random_Pet: I am homeschooled
- FrozenSolstice: If Avicus was alive I would __ It.
- SethSky: I love star wars, my favorite scenes were the Hoth battle and Death Star.
- PieZ: I purposely threw a tournament once to teach my leader a lesson.
- Arigenn: My first friend on Avicus was "TheRomanTrident"
- MidnightStorm: I'm a mermaid.
- Awesomerp: I was born with 2 thumbs on the same hand.
- Tazz: I am golden elite on CS:GO
- Resepignev: I almost got expelled twice because of my behavior at school.
- Smiley: I have a nebula strategy called "strolling" where I just run at the monument without fighting until I get it.
- Iron: I once had Cancer/ Luekimia

Hope you guys learned some cool facts! Should I do another one with players? Tell me down below ^=^.
